DOC.brief_summary: This study compare immediate post-abortion start two progestin-based contraceptive ( DMPA etonorgestrel implant ) among woman first trimester medical abortion wish use method post-abortion contraception .
DOC.brief_title: Study Immediate Start Progestin Contraceptives Medical Abortion
DOC.criteria: Women medical abortion desire progestinbased contraceptive ( injectables implant )
